title: Mobile app operations
description: Instructions for each type of operation which can be done from the mobile app.

instructions.name: Check a condition
instructions.relateds_txt: Checkbox conditions belong to the following element types

steps.description: Click on "IMI, Instant Material Informations" to access the QR code scanner.
Point the camera of your device toward the QR code of the element you want to update. Depending on the scanned QR code, you are automatically redirected to the page of the element to update.
Click on the button to check the condition. (confirmation ?)

instructions.name: Fill in an input
instructions.relateds_txt: Inputs fields belong to the following element types

steps.description: Click on "IMI, Instant Material Informations" to access the QR code scanner.
Point the camera of your device toward the QR code of the element you want to update. Depending on the scanned QR code, you are automatically redirected to the page of the element to update.
Fill in the field and confirm.

instructions.name: Create a Proof of delivery
instructions.relateds_txt: A proof of delivery refers to a shipment

steps.description: Click on "POD, Proof of delivery" to access the QR code scanner.
Point the camera of your device toward the QR code of the waybill of the shipment for wich you want to create a POD. You are automatically redirected to the page to create a POD for this shipment.

steps.from: From the proof of delivery's page
steps.description: Require the client's signature and confirm.

instructions.name: Create an Inspection report
instructions.relateds_txt: An inspection report refers to a box

steps.description: Click on "IR, Inspection report" to access the QR code scanner.
Point the camera of your device toward the QR code of the box to inspect.
Point the camera of your device toward the QR code of the items to inspect. You are automatically redirected to the page to create an Inspection report for this box.
